returns.holdId: The unique identifier of the hold.

params.dispositionAction: The action to take when the period expires (e.g. "archive", "delete").
params.recordType: The type of record this policy applies to.

returns.policyId: The unique identifier of the policy.

activeHoldCount().notice: Returns the number of active holds.

applyHold(string,string,string,bytes32).notice: Places a legal hold on a scope of records.

checkDisposition(bytes32).notice: Checks whether a record can be disposed.

dispose(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Disposes a record if no active holds prevent it.

getHold(bytes32).notice: Retrieves a hold by its ID.

getPolicy(bytes32).notice: Retrieves a policy by its ID.

setRetention(string,uint256,string,strin.notice: Sets a retention policy for a record type.
